definitions.text: the principal activity in your life that you do to earn money
examples: he's not in my line of business

definitions.text: the control of a country by military forces of a foreign power
any activity that occupies a person's attention
examples: he missed the bell in his occupation with the computer game

definitions.text: the act of occupying or taking possession of a building
examples: occupation of a building without a certificate of occupancy is illegal

definitions.text: the period of time during which a place or position or nation is occupied
examples: during the German occupation of Paris
